title: Should Riot release older versions of the game for people to play casually?
body:
I personally think it would be fantastic for Riot to give us an option to play much older versions of the game, for example to let us play on the most updated patch of season 1, or season 2 or 3. I don't think it should be used for ranked, but just to be played casually with friends or something.

Come on rito, let us enjoy the facerolling AP yi again ^.^
{{champion:11}} {{item:3089}}

Discuss the same of reddit if you feel you must:
http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2pgsgl/should_riot_release_older_versions_of_the_game/
